Research Intern | Directorate of Research, Government of Arunachal Pradesh‚Äã
‚Äã
                    
(August  2025 ‚Äì Present)

Developed a low-resource speech-to-speech translation pipeline using Wav2Vec 2.0 for ASR, MarianMT for NMT, and Tacotron 2

Optimised system architecture to reduce translation latency to under 2‚ÄØseconds, enabling real time deployment for field use.

                        https://github.com/akshit7093/Chatbot-for-websites 
(July 2024 ‚Äì December 2024) 
‚óè‚Äã
Developed a universal chatbot platform by fine‚Äëtuning Llama3.1 LLM using LoRA and integrating RAG with FAISS for 
domain‚Äëspecific retrieval, boosting query accuracy to 90‚ÄØ% and improving response relevance by 25‚ÄØ%. 
‚óè‚Äã
Designed a flexible Python backend with modular components in FastAPI increasing code reusability to 65% .

(August 2024 ‚Äì September 2024) 
‚óè‚Äã
Developed a credit card fraud detection system using XGBoost, analyzing 1 million transaction records. 
‚óè‚Äã
Engineered 20+ features from behavioral and time-series data then trained an XGBoost model on SageMaker to drop false

‚óè‚Äã
Built an NLP model for SMS spam detection using Python and scikit-learn, achieving 95% accuracy on test data. 
PROJECT
 
OpenStack Cloud Management System with Natural Language Interface          https://github.com/akshit7093/VM_manager_AgenticAi 
‚óè‚Äã
Built a cloud management system interfacing with OpenStack infrastructure APIs. 
‚óè‚Äã
Enabled users to issue natural language prompts (e.g., "create a server" or "delete a volume"), which an AI agent created using

‚óè‚Äã
Built an interactive CLI and a web app for remote management, featuring resource analytics and container monitoring per VM. 
‚óè‚Äã
Designed RESTful backend with Fastapi and containerized the application using Docker. 
‚óè‚Äã
Technologies: Python, OpenStack SDK, Gemini, Fastapi, Docker, LangChain

Created a video chat application using React and Node.js to enable video communication with ASL translation. 
‚óè‚Äã
Implemented American Sign Language (ASL) detection using MediaPipe for landmarks and an LSTM network in TensorFlow, 
reaching 89% accuracy on a small dataset of 20 videos. 
‚óè‚Äã
Reduced latency from 500ms to 180ms using model quantization (TensorFlow Lite) and frame-rate optimization.

Remote
‚Ä¢ Worked on OAuth authentication using Google and Linkedin providers for user authentication, developed features like

‚Ä¢ Created an automated job expiration pipeline to schedule job deletion after a certain time, implemented validation
logic to prevent duplicate job postings and referrals, hence reducing spam and closed job postings.
‚Ä¢ Developed a document processing pipeline to extract job posting parameters. The pipeline included OCR, dynamic
job tagging, type validation etc to ensure data consistency and easier management of multiple openings.
PROJECTS
Docs AI ¬á | Next.Js, Node.js, Bun, TypeScript, Hono, Cloudflare workers/pages, TailwindCSS
‚Ä¢ Built a documentation assistant platform with a TypeScript/Bun backend that crawls documentation websites
using user-provided sitemap URLs. Extracted page content is indexed for intelligent search and query
matching. The frontend features a sleek, responsive terminal-style interface for technical queries.

growth in API usage, ensuring reliable global performance.

connections between users.

requests, accepting or deleting requests, and managing the feed.

TailwindCSS, featuring smooth scrolling navigation, interactive pricing calculator, and dark mode with
gradient branding.
‚Ä¢ Implemented engaging UI features including testimonials carousel, FAQ accordion, and a blog section
with search and filtering, ensuring an attractive and user-friendly interface.

pinned_repositories.name: mindsdb
pinned_repositories.description: The platform for building AI from enterprise data

top_repositories.name: ReFaceX
top_repositories.description: ReFaceX is an advanced AI-powered tool for seamless face swapping and image enhancement. With just one click, it delivers high-quality, professional results‚Äîperfect for film, advertising, and content creation. Built on cutting-edge technology, ReFaceX combines speed, precision, and ease of use.

top_repositories.name: Predicting-Customer-Purchase-Amount-Insights-from-Retail-Data
top_repositories.description: This study analyzes retail transaction data to understand purchasing behavior and predict purchase amounts. Using feature engineering, attributes such as TotalPurchase, AgeGroup, and temporal features were derived.

top_repositories.name: Credit-Risk-Prediction-System
top_repositories.description: Developed a credit risk prediction system using Lending Club loan data (~800K records). Implemented models for Probability of Default (PD), Loss Given Default (LGD), and Exposure at Default (EAD) with logistic and linear regression. Delivered an interpretable scorecard and evaluated model stability using recent loan applications.

top_repositories.name: Blinkit_Analysis_Dashboard
top_repositories.description: Blinkit Data Analysis Dashboard built in Power BI showcasing sales performance, customer insights, and outlet analysis with key KPIs & visualizations.
